Package uno.anahata.asi.swing.internal

Class EdtPropertyChangeListener

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.swing.internal.EdtPropertyChangeListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
HierarchyListener, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class EdtPropertyChangeListener extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener, HierarchyListener
A smart, lifecycle-aware PropertyChangeListener that ensures UI updates occur on the Event Dispatch Thread (EDT). It automatically manages its subscription to the PropertyChangeSource based on the displayability of the associated JComponent.

This class eliminates the need for manual addNotify/removeNotify boilerplate and prevents memory leaks by unregistering itself when the component is removed from the UI hierarchy.

Author:
anahata

  • Constructor Details

    • EdtPropertyChangeListener

      public EdtPropertyChangeListener(@NonNull @NonNull JComponent component, @NonNull @NonNull PropertyChangeSource source, String propertyName, @NonNull @NonNull Consumer<PropertyChangeEvent> action)
      Constructs a new EdtPropertyChangeListener and binds it to the component's lifecycle.
      Parameters:
      component - The UI component whose lifecycle determines the subscription.
      source - The model object providing property change events.
      propertyName - The name of the property to listen for, or null for all properties.
      action - The action to perform on the EDT when the property changes.

    • EdtPropertyChangeListener

      public EdtPropertyChangeListener(@NonNull @NonNull JComponent component, @NonNull @NonNull PropertyChangeSource source, String propertyName, @NonNull @NonNull Consumer<PropertyChangeEvent> action, @NonNull @NonNull EdtPropertyChangeListener.Mode mode)
      Constructs a new EdtPropertyChangeListener with a specific execution mode.
      Parameters:
      component - The UI component whose lifecycle determines the subscription.
      source - The model object providing property change events.
      propertyName - The name of the property to listen for, or null for all properties.
      action - The action to perform on the EDT when the property changes.
      mode - The thread switching mode.
